name: Lunair
tagline: Generate studio-quality explainer videos. Instantly.
description: The fastest way to add a video to your landing page. As easy as writing, with creative control. Describe your product or idea and Lunair generates a complete video: consistent characters, custom scenes (not stock assets), voiceover, music, and motion, delivered as a ready-to-share video file. Then edit with plain language: choose a narrator, tweak the script, refine scenes to match your brand. Built for custom, on-brand explainers and marketing videos, not generic AI clips. Join 5,000+ creators.

name: Prompt Library
tagline: All your best prompts. One shortcut away.
description: Save, tag, and organize prompts in collections, then press ‚åò‚å•P to instantly insert them into any app on your Mac.

name: Formaly
tagline: Forms that feel like conversations
description: Create AI-powered conversational forms in seconds. Build forms with natural language prompts, collect feedback through chat, and get instant AI insights.

name: Plus AI Presentation Agent
tagline: AI agent that helps you design PowerPoint slides
description: Meet the Plus AI Presentation Agent for PowerPoint. Plus AI doesn‚Äôt just generate slides - it helps you plan your deck, write content, format slides, and edit content directly inside PowerPoint. Using Plus AI's best-in-class PowerPoint editing tools, the Plus AI agent can create presentations from a prompt, rewrite messy slides, and iterate on slide designs via chat. It works directly in PowerPoint and can help you fine-tune slides until they are ready to present. Try it for free today!

name: Habit Island
tagline: Build a Kingdom From Habits
description: Habit Island turns your daily habits and goals into a strategy game. Complete tasks, build structures, and earn gems and achievements as your consistency grows your island.

name: UnderSurface
tagline: A diary that listens back!
description: UnderSurface is a journaling app where inner voices respond to your writing in real time. You type. You pause. An inner part reacts. It may notice what you're avoiding, sit with you in discomfort or connect dots you haven't seen yet. It's not a chatbot or a therapist. It's a writing companion. It works in any browser and is multilingual. Strict privacy, export and account controls. Built as a solo project because I kept abandoning my own journal entries the moment they got real.

name: Test Your Idea
tagline: Find weak spots in your startup idea. Real data, not vibes.
description: Stop building something nobody wants. We scan 20+ live data sources and show you what's blocking your idea: competitors, market size, demand signals. Every number links to its source. 1,400+ ideas tested, 9 out of 10 weren't ready.

name: UserWants
tagline: Stop guessing. Build what users want.
description: With UserWants, your users tell you what they actually want. Collect their feedback, let them vote, and focus on building the stuff that actually matters. Simple, minimal, no unnecessary features, just what you need to ship faster.

name: Whyze
tagline: Understand why users leave your product ‚Äî not just where
description: Whyze uses AI to analyze your conversion funnel and explain why users drop off. Get root causes instead of charts and receive actionable insights in seconds.

name: Upti
tagline: All your service status pages, in one place
description: Upti focuses on speed and simplicity instead of heavy monitoring. Unlike traditional uptime tools that require setup, accounts, and alerts, Upti gives you an instant overview of current outages across major cloud providers and SaaS platforms ‚Äî all in one place. It‚Äôs built for moments when something is already broken and you just need to know what‚Äôs down, right now, without jumping between multiple status pages.

name: Merra AI - Automated video creation
tagline: Create videos in minutes & grow your brand / personal brand.
description: Merra automates marketing video production from your raw clips. Upload a voice sample, a short company description, and footage; it generates ideas, scripts, voiceovers, edits, music, and captions in minutes so you can post daily without micromanaging timelines. Merra serves creators, startups, and teams that want speed and consistency over complex effects. Start free with a few videos, then scale to unlimited generation and team profiles.

name: PDF to Google Sheets
tagline: PDF tables ‚Üí live Google Sheets link. No broken columns.
description: You copy a table from a PDF, paste it into a spreadsheet, and half the columns are wrong. Merged cells break, rows shift. You spend 30 minutes fixing what should've taken 30 seconds. pdf2sheets converts PDF tables into Google Sheets with layout preserved. Works with scans too. Upload ‚Üí pick pages ‚Üí get an editable Google Sheets link. Copy to your Drive or download as xlsx or csv. No registration. Files encrypted and auto-deleted.

name: MathPal
tagline: Don't just get the answer. Understand the math.
description: Struggling with math? You're not alone‚Äîbut what if every challenging problem became actually fun to solve and easy to understand? Mathpal is your AI guide, making learning math easier and more fun than ever.

name: Clip AI
tagline: Turn 1 long video into 7 viral clips in minutes
description: Stop manually scrubbing through Zoom calls. Clip AI auto-detects viral highlights, burns in English/Chinese subtitles, and generates ready-to-post drafts for TikTok, X, and YouTube Shorts. The fastest way to repurpose your content.

name: RallyFit
tagline: RallyFit: The AI "Mirror" for your fitness
description: RallyFit is the "Consistency Engine" replacing your fragmented stack. Stop switching between MFP, Strong, and Sleep apps. We unify Training, Nutrition, and Bio-Data into one dashboard. Features: üèãÔ∏è Unified Logging: Lifts (RPE), Macros (Barcode Scanner) & Cardio. ü™û AI Mirror: A Genkit analyst that reads your logs to spot correlations‚Äînot generic advice. ‚ö° PWA First: Offline-ready on Mobile & Desktop. üö´ Zero Ads. Start your 14-Day Free Trial.

name: Pala - Productivity Planner
tagline: The productivity app that doesn‚Äôt feel like a job.
description: Most productivity apps feel like a second job. I built Pala to end the cycle of manual logging and rigid lists. Circular Timeline: Visualize your day on a 24-hour clock face. AI Planning: Just brain-dump your tasks; the AI schedules them for you. Context-Aware: Integrates weather data so you don't plan hikes in the rain. Focus & Insights: Includes a dedicated Focus Mode and completion analytics. Stop managing your tools and start mastering your time.

name: Doen AI
tagline: AI Guidance for Physical Work
description: DoenAI brings ‚ÄúThe Matrix‚Äù to real-world work. Workers wear a camera and our AI sees what they see, guiding them step-by-step through complex physical tasks‚Äîfrom HVAC to manufacturing‚Äîso anyone can perform skilled labor immediately without months of training.

name: Mimir - Cursor for Product managers
tagline: Mimir helps you figure out what to build and then builds it.
description: Paste customer feedback, support tickets, or interview transcripts. Get ranked recommendations on what to build next in 60 seconds. Every insight traces back to source quotes. AI extracts themes, shows contradictions, and generates build specs + agent tasks ready for Cursor or Claude. Built for technical founders drowning in feedback with no time to analyze it. Zero setup required ‚Äî just paste and go.

name: FoodCraft
tagline: AI adapts any recipe to your calories, macros and diet
description: FoodCraft is an AI nutrition platform. Snap a photo of your ingredients with Spark Vision and instantly get matched recipes. Every recipe adapts to your caloric goals, allergies, and dietary preferences (vegan, keto, gluten-free) in under 3 seconds. Features auto meal planning, smart shopping lists, and family mode for different dietary profiles at the same table. 3,200+ recipes. Free tier available, premium at $9.99/mo.

name: Knowdeep.ai
tagline: The Agentic OS for Research
description: Knowdeep.ai is a research agentic OS. You design the agent network in Agent Studio‚Äîinstructions once, agents + subagents mapped end-to-end‚Äîthen hit run. It ingests PDFs + web sources, verifies facts across references, and outputs comprehensive, citation-backed reports with visual insights.
